snippet: Egypt must eliminate Ghana, a 2010 quarterfinalist, to make it to the World Cup for the first time in more than 20 years.
abstract: Egypt must eliminate Ghana to make it to soccer's World Cup for the first time in more than 20 years; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Egypt must eliminate Ghana, a 2010 quarterfinalist, to make it to the World Cup for the first time in more than 20 years.

headline.main: World Cup Qualifying Continues in Africa
